meta.description: Fast & Free Delivery! Shop for automotive tires online from over 300+ brands. Have them shipped to and installed at one of our 10,000+ installation centers, making the purchase and installation process painless and simple.
meta.title: Buy Automotive Tires Online for Less

categoriesOrTypes.title: Buy {{brand}} {{categoryOrType}} Tires | Free Shipping, Fast Install
categoriesOrTypes.description: SimpleTire offers fast, free delivery on {{brand}} {{categoryOrType}} tires, as well as easy installation and setup. Purchase new tires at SimpleTire.com and schedule your new tire installation today.

productLine.title: Buy {{brand}} {{productLine}} Tires Online
productLine.description: Buy new {{brand}} {{productLine}} tires from SimpleTire at the lowest cost and get them delivered directly to you, or one of our 10,000+ installation centers in days. Schedule an installation with your preferred mechanic to make tire buying a painless and simple process.

pdp.title: Buy {{brand}} {{productLine}} {{tireSize}} Tires
pdp.description: Buy {{brand}} {{productLine}} tires in the size you need at a low cost with free shipping direct, to you or one of our 10,000+ installation centers.

reviews.title: {{brand}} {{productLine}} Tire Reviews & Ratings
reviews.description: Read real reviews and tire quality ratings from actual customers for {{brand}} {{productLine}} tires, or help others find the best tires for their vehicle by submitting a {{brand}} {{productLine}} tire review of your own.

writeAReview.title: Write a Review: {{brand}} {{productLine}}
writeAReview.description: Write a review for {{brand}} {{productLine}} tires at SimpleTire.com

reviewListingPages.title: Reviews & Ratings for Tire Brands, Types & Categories
reviewListingPages.description: Search for reviews and tire quality ratings from actual consumers across tire brands, types, and categories to get first-hand feedback from people like you on the tires you need.

brandOrCategoryOrType.title: {{brandOrCategoryOrType}} Tire Reviews & Ratings from Real Customers
brandOrCategoryOrType.description: Read real reviews and tire quality ratings from actual customers for {{brandOrCategoryOrType}} tires, or help others find the best tires for their vehicle by submitting a {{brandOrCategoryOrType}} tire review of your own.

tireSizes.title: Shop for {{tireSize}} Tires for Your Vehicle
tireSizes.description: Find the largest selection of {{tireSize}} tires you need with SimpleTire. Look for the size you need across tire types, brands, performance categories and more with fast, free shipping.

categoriesOrTypes.title: Shop for {{tireSize}} {{categoryOrType}} Tires for Your Vehicle
categoriesOrTypes.description: Shop for the best {{categoryOrType}} tires in the size you need at a low-cost with fast and free shipping direct to you or the installer of your choice.

year.title: Shop {{year}} {{make}} {{model}} Tires
year.description: Find the best tires for your {{year}} {{make}} {{model}}, shipped free and direct to you or one of our 10,000+ installation centers. Shop for the best deal on your {{year}} {{make}} {{model}}.

tireSize.title: Buy {{make}} {{model}} {{trim}} {{tireSize}} Tires
tireSize.description: Find the best {{tireSize}} tires for your {{make}} {{model}} {{trim}} and have them shipped for free directly to you, or to one of our 10,000+ installation centers making the tire buying process painless and simple.

roadHazard.content:
- Protection for 3 years
- Replacement up to 100% of the tire cost
- Repairs reimbursed up to $25 per tire, per ocurrence

Most tire failure are punctures or bruises that manufacturerâ€™s warranty typically doesnâ€™t cover. Our Road Hazard Coverage provides coverage for 36 months from the date of  purchase. It covers up to $400 during the first year, up to $200 on year two and $100 on year three.
roadHazard.title: Road Hazard Coverage
roadHazard.subtitle: Get protected for when a tire fails as a result of a puncture, bruise or impact.
